title: Huawei P50 Pocket Review: Excellent screen and main camera on a foldable, but still a niche
content:
After opting to release its 2021 foldable phone, the Huawei Mate X2, in mainland China only, Huawei is back on the global stage (that would be Europe and chunks of Asia) with a new foldable, the Huwei P50 Pocket. Just like Samsung’s Galaxy Z Flip 3, it is a clamshell-style foldable that transforms from a

The post Huawei P50 Pocket Review: Excellent screen and main camera on a foldable, but still a niche appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Huawei P50 Pocket is a clamshell foldable with high fashion aspirations -- and it's priced like one too. Read our review to know more!
